title: About
text:
Hey there, I’m Matteo Aldovardi, and I’m pretty passionate about math. I studied mathematics at the University of Pisa.
I graduated on October 28th 2022 with a thesis in Harmonic Analysis. If you’re curious, you can find it in the University’s archive here:
https://etd.adm.unipi.it/theses/available/etd-10012022-110009/
I also teamed up with my thesis advisor to write an article based on my thesis work. It’s a new result, a slightly refined version of the Hardy Fractional Inequality, and you can give it a read here:
https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s40574-023-00359-7#article-info
As of October 2023, I’m following Jeremy Howard’s fastai course. As part of my coursework, I’ve created a web app over at huggingface.co. This app can tell you if surfaces are cracked or intact using a neural network called resnet18. I trained this neural net using the dataset available at this website:
https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/5y9wdsg2zt/2
If you’d like to see my project in action, you can check it out here:
https://huggingface.co/spaces/MatteoAld/Muri

title: About
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: About
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
